name: Dark Time
description:
The player has a special ability, but does not know what it is. The kingdom where he lives is under attack by the dark power. They no longer stand a chance. You and the king escape.  Will you fight the king or will you die?

An update will come and all bugs will be fixed and the game will be better(UI,Jump etc..) when the Game Jam is over :D

0.2 version features:
Checkpoints
After death, the dialog is no longer displayed.
Better Jump.
Better rewind.
Rewind cooldown text

And more stuff!

Game made by: Justin Tide

Music & SFX: Jacky Chan, Epidemic Sound
